paper_abstract: This paper presents an iterative method for solving a class of generalized quasi-variational-like inclusions with fuzzy mappings. The method employs step size controls that enable applications to problems where certain set-valued mappings do not always map to empty set. The algorithm also adopts the recently introduced (H, eta)-monotone concept which unifies many known monotonicities. Thus generalized many existing results.
paper_title: An iterative method for quasi-variational-like inclusions with fuzzy mappings
